en: Military Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国北洋时期最后一个中央政府，由张作霖在北京建立，其瓦解标志着北洋政府时代的结束。
description.en: The last central government of the Beiyang period of the Republic of China, established in Beijing by Zhang Zuolin. Its collapse marked the end of the Beiyang era.

description.zh-cn: 中国奉系军阀首领，中华民国军政府的缔造者与最高领导人，北洋时期的最后一位国家元首。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique, founder and supreme leader of the Military Government of the Republic of China, and the last head of state of the Beiyang period.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，北洋时期最后一位国务总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and the last Premier of the State Council during the Beiyang period.

description.zh-cn: 导致奉系军阀首领张作霖死亡的暗杀事件，直接导致了安国军政府的瓦解。
description.en: An assassination event that resulted in the death of Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin, directly leading to the collapse of the Anguojun Government.

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党领导、国民政府发动的统一中国的军事行动，其主要目标为推翻北洋政府。
description.en: A military campaign led by the Kuomintang and launched by the Nationalist Government to unify China, with the primary objective of overthrowing the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖之子，东北军领袖。在张作霖死后继承其权力，并最终宣布东北易帜，服从国民政府。
description.en: Son of Zhang Zuolin and leader of the Northeastern Army. He inherited his father's power after his death and eventually declared the Northeast Flag Replacement, submitting to the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一，1927年被张作霖的安国军政府逮捕并处决。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Chinese Communist Party, arrested and executed by Zhang Zuolin's Anguojun Government in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 由张作霖领导的军事力量，是中华民国军政府的主要武装部队。
description.en: The military force led by Zhang Zuolin, serving as the main armed forces of the Military Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府的武装力量，在北伐战争中与安国军作战。
description.en: The armed forces of the Nationalist Government, which fought against the Anguojun during the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 北伐战争中的一场关键战役，国民革命军在此击败孙传芳率领的安国军主力，奠定了南京国民政府的基业。
description.en: A key battle in the Northern Expedition where the National Revolutionary Army defeated the main force of the Anguojun led by Sun Chuanfang, securing the foundation of the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

zh-cn: 中华民国南京国民政府

description.zh-cn: 由中国国民党建立的中华民国政府，通过北伐战争推翻了北洋政府。
description.en: The government of the Republic of China established by the Kuomintang, which overthrew the Beiyang government through the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 直系军阀，后与张作霖合作，是安国军的重要将领。
description.en: A warlord of the Zhili clique who later collaborated with Zhang Zuolin and became a key commander in the Anguojun.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀，安国军的重要将领之一，以其在山东的统治而闻名。
description.en: A warlord of the Fengtian clique and a key commander of the Anguojun, known for his rule in Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 指张学良宣布东北地区服从国民政府，放弃北洋政府五色旗，改用国民政府的青天白日满地红旗的事件。标志着北伐的结束和国民政府在形式上统一中国。
description.en: Refers to Zhang Xueliang's announcement that the Northeast region would obey the Nationalist Government, abandoning the Five-Colored Flag of the Beiyang Government in favor of the Blue Sky, White Sun, and Wholly Red Earth flag. It marked the end of the Northern Expedition and the nominal unification of China under the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 指中华民国1912年至1928年间由北洋军阀控制的中央政府。安国军政府是其最后一个政权。
description.en: Refers to the central government of the Republic of China controlled by the Beiyang warlords from 1912 to 1928. The Anguojun Government was its final regime.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖是中华民国军政府的缔造者，并于1927年6月16日在北京建立该政府。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was the founder of the Military Government of the Republic of China, establishing it in Beijing on June 16, 1927.

position.zh-cn: 中华民国军政府陆海军大元帅
position.en: Grand Marshal of the Army and Navy of the Military Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 张作霖就任大元帅，行使大总统职权，是安国军政府的最高领导人。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin assumed the position of Grand Marshal, exercising presidential powers as the supreme leader of the Anguojun Government.

description.zh-cn: 潘复于1927年6月20日出任安国军政府的国务总理。
description.en: Pan Fu was appointed Premier of the State Council of the Anguojun Government on June 20, 1927.

description.zh-cn: 在皇姑屯事件中，张作霖乘坐的火车被炸，其本人被炸死。
description.en: In the Huanggutun incident, Zhang Zuolin was killed when his train was bombed.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中遇刺身亡，直接导致安国军政府瓦解。
description.en: The assassination of Zhang Zuolin in the Huanggutun incident directly led to the collapse of the Anguojun Government.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的北伐行动最终击败了安国军，并推翻了其所代表的北洋政府。
description.en: The Northern Expedition of the National Revolutionary Army ultimately defeated the Anguojun and overthrew the Beiyang government it represented.

description.zh-cn: 张学良是张作霖之子。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang is the son of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 1927年，张作霖下令处死了中国共产党创始人之一的李大钊。
description.en: In 1927, Zhang Zuolin ordered the execution of Li Dazhao, one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 在北伐战争期间，安国军与国民革命军是敌对的军事力量。
description.en: During the Northern Expedition, the Anguojun and the National Revolutionary Army were opposing military forces.

description.zh-cn: 在龙潭战斗中，国民革命军打败了由孙传芳率领的安国军，导致安国军北撤。
description.en: In the Battle of Longtan, the National Revolutionary Army defeated the Anguojun led by Sun Chuanfang, forcing the Anguojun to retreat north.

description.zh-cn: 龙潭战斗的胜利奠定了南京国民政府的基业。
description.en: The victory in the Battle of Longtan secured the foundation of the Nanjing Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 孙传芳与张宗昌等人带头“劝进”，推举张作霖为安国军总司令。
description.en: Sun Chuanfang, along with Zhang Zongchang and others, took the lead in 'persuading' Zhang Zuolin to become the commander-in-chief of the Anguojun.

description.zh-cn: 张宗昌与孙传芳等人带头“劝进”，推举张作霖为安国军总司令。
description.en: Zhang Zongchang, along with Sun Chuanfang and others, took the lead in 'persuading' Zhang Zuolin to become the commander-in-chief of the Anguojun.

description.zh-cn: 张学良顶住日本的压力，于1928年12月29日宣布易帜，服从国民政府。
description.en: Resisting pressure from Japan, Zhang Xueliang announced the flag replacement on December 29, 1928, pledging allegiance to the Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 东北易帜标志着北洋政府的完全瓦解。
description.en: The Northeast Flag Replacement marked the complete collapse of the Beiyang government.

description.zh-cn: 东北易帜使国民政府在形式上完成了中国的统一。
description.en: The Northeast Flag Replacement led to the nominal unification of China under the Nationalist Government.
